articles.title: CNN meteorologist explains cause of water crisis in Jackson, Mississippi - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN meteorologist Chad Myers explains how flooding in Jackson, Mississippi caused the failure of the main water treatment facility, resulting in a clean water crisis in the state's largest city.

articles.author: Jennifer Gray, CNN meteorologist
articles.title: A prolonged and record heat wave builds over the West this week
articles.description: Some of the hottest temperatures of the year are on the way for the West Coast and possibly staying dangerously hot through Labor Day as a mega heat wave builds in for the long term.
articles.content:
#Hoquiam tied record high today with 84°, which was last set in 2007. Record highs are possible on Tuesday.
Record highs for 8/30Sea-Tac Airport: 88° in 1987Olympia: 93° in 1944Bellingham: 85° in 19… [+125 chars]

articles.title: How to help victims of the Pakistan floods
articles.description: Torrential rains and extreme flooding have killed more than 1,100 people in Pakistan since mid-June.
articles.content: Torrential rains and extreme flooding have killed more than 1,100 people in Pakistan since mid-June. Nearly 400 of those who have died were children and millions of people have been displaced by the … [+302 chars]

articles.title: Watch: TV anchor says she got fired for letting her hair go gray. See CNN anchors' reaction - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN anchors Erica Hill and Christine Romans and CNN business correspondent Rahel Solomon share their thoughts about the firing of Canadian TV news anchor Lisa LaFlamme after she claimed she was ousted because she let her hair go gray.

articles.author: Melissa Alonso, Zoe Sottile
articles.title: 11-year-old boy dies after being swept into a storm drain during flash flood
articles.description: An 11-year-old boy died after he fell into the water and was swept into a storm drain during a flash flood in northwest Arkansas Monday evening, according to police.
articles.content:
An 11-year-old boy died after he fell into the water and was swept into a storm drain during a flash floodin northwest Arkansas Monday evening, according to police.

articles.author: Jason Hanna and Nouran Salahieh, CNN
articles.title: 'Do not drink the water': Mississippi National Guard will hand out water as Jackson's main water facility fails
articles.description: Mississippi's capital city lacks enough water pressure to fight fires, flush toilets and meet other critical needs because its main water treatment facility began failing Monday, the governor said -- a problem officials blame on longstanding water system prob…

articles.title: An 'annoyed' Melania Trump stays mum on Mar-a-Lago search as she promotes NFT business

articles.title: Pakistan floods caused by 'monsoon on steroids,' says UN chief in urgent appeal

articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine

articles.author: Opinion by David A. Andelman
articles.title: Opinion: Cold showers in Germany, France's air conditioning crackdown are signs of Europe's future
articles.description: Most of the European Union faces a toxic confluence of high temperatures, higher energy prices and a Russian threat to cut off gas supplies, writes David A. Andelman, and these nations are putting pressure on their citizens to hold down consumption.
